adrFormatAddress: 421 8th Ave, New York, NY 10001-2702, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve been coming to this bar weekly for a while, it’s a great commuter bar and extremely close to MSG.

The bar has improved in quality with their recently revamp (in 2023). Their bottle selection for gin and bourbon is great. The beer selection is good, I wish it rotated more.

There has never been a bad bartender nor pour that I’ve had. The staff is extremely nice and does a great job working with crowded environments like on game days and train delays. Additionally, they have DJs a few nights a week!

Hats off to this bar and swing in on your way in or out of town! Cheers!

originalText.text: I was a fan of the Dead Rabbit so I was excited to try this place. As far as I can see, this is as good as a bar at a transit hub can get. Service was quick and friendly, drinks were great and the location is convenient. I can see people saying this isn't a great bar, but in reality this is a great place given the location inside MSG/Moniyhan Train Hall.

originalText.text:
Cool bar and you can order food from the hall to dine there. Great atmosphere and buzz! Guinness is as good as it gets!

A great place for a few drinks or a bite!

text.text:
Cool bar and you can order food from the hall to dine there. Great atmosphere and buzz! Guinness is as good as it gets!

A great place for a few drinks or a bite!

originalText.text:
Every time I come here, the service is great and the staff really friendly. The food is excellent. I highly recommend the Devilled Eggs and the Fish and Chips which were a great reminder of how good they are back home in England.

A.J. is a talented bar tender. When you don't know what you want to drink, give him an idea of your poison of choice - vodka, whisky, wine etc and he's got you. I've watched every single customer over the last three months love what he creates for them, including me!

Ignore the negative reviews, the reality is that I've been coming here for a while and never seen or had a bad experience.
